name: ZeroSum
description: ZeroSum is a gaming infrastructure platform that rewards viewers, players and developers. ZeroSum creates new lines of revenue for all parties through competition powered by AI. Gamers and Viewers can now open challenges on a wide selection of games, create tournaments and compete to earn. Game Developers can get their Web2 OR Web3 game integrated via a lightning fast and free smart API. With ZeroSum now everyone has skin in the game.
